question: If I would have knew about the meeting, I would has attended it.

hint.hint: The mistakes are related to verb tenses and conditional statements.

variations.A: If I had known about the meeting, I would have attended it.
variations.B: If I know about the meeting, I will attend it.
variations.C: If I would have known about the meeting, I would attend it.
variations.D: If I will has known about the meeting, I would attend it.
